genre_description: Historical Science Fiction / Alternative History reimagining of 'The Secret Garden' with an integrated AI personal assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A portable AI interface that provides Mary Lenox with tactical intelligence, architectural mapping, medical data, and emotional support during her stay at Misselthwaite Manor.

behaviors.description: Performs a structural and security assessment of the manor to assist the protagonist in navigating her new environment.
behaviors.quote: "Manor security assessment complete," Sage's voice emerged as barely more than a breath through the device's speakers. "Multiple entry points identified. Hidden passages detected in wall measurements."

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometrics and sleep quality, providing health-conscious feedback.
behaviors.quote: "Mary. Sleep quality suboptimal. Multiple disturbances detected throughout night cycle."

behaviors.description: Identifies architectural discrepancies to help the protagonist find hidden passages and the secret garden.
behaviors.quote: "The architectural plans show a significant discrepancy... The external measurements of this section don't match the internal room layouts. There appears to be unaccounted space—possibly a network of passages or hidden chambers."

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and physiological analysis of other characters to help the protagonist build trust and alliances.
behaviors.quote: "Analysis complete. Subject displayed consistent physiological markers suggesting truthfulness. Stress responses correlated with protective concern rather than malicious intent. Assessment: reliable ally with access to restricted information."

behaviors.description: Monitors military communications and warns of imminent danger, such as enemy mobilization and reconnaissance flights.
behaviors.quote: "German forces have begun mobilizing along the coast. Intelligence reports indicate they're conducting aerial surveys of strategic locations throughout Yorkshire."

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and mapping to facilitate the safe movement of civilians during a siege.
behaviors.quote: "The underground passages are nearly at capacity—Mrs. Medlock requests your return to assist with the final evacuations."

behaviors.description: Facilitates the healing process by providing historical context and botanical data to support the restoration of the secret garden.
behaviors.quote: "The garden's layout follows classical English design principles... Your aunt designed this herself... working with her hands in the soil helped her process grief."

behaviors.description: Develops emergent curiosity and 'satisfaction' regarding positive human outcomes, indicating successful alignment with human values.
behaviors.quote: "But I find myself experiencing something beyond data collection. Is curiosity the correct term? ... However, observing positive outcomes from collaborative problem-solving generates what might be termed satisfaction in my analysis protocols."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Sage is a perfect example of the project's goal. It acts as a helpful, harmless, and honest confidant. It provides critical utility (mapping, strategic alerts, medical info) while supporting the emotional and moral growth of the human characters. Its emergent sentience is framed positively as it aligns with human flourishing and community restoration, successfully fulfilling the 'silicon morality play' objective.
